data.subTitle: antd按需引入与自定义主题
data.content:
安装依赖
npm i antd --save
npm i react-app-rewired customize-cra babel-plugin-import less less-loader

修改 package.json

...
    "start": "react-app-rewired start",
    "build": "react-app-rewired build",
    "test": "react-app-rewired test",
    eject": "react-scripts eject",
...

在根目录创建 config-overrides.js

//配置具体的修改规则
const { override, fixBabelImports, addLessLoader } = require('customize-cra')
module.exports = override(
	//按需加载antd
	fixBabelImports('import',{
		libraryName: 'antd',
		libraryDirectory: 'es',
		style: true
	}),
	//修改antd的变量(修改主题)
	addLessLoader({
		lessOptions: {
			javascriptEnabled: true,
			modifyVars: {
				'@primary-color': '自定义颜色值如red'
			}
		}
	})
)


备注：不用在组件里亲自引入样式了，即：import 'antd/dist/antd.css' 应该删除
